name: Outside Inside Backpack Table Tennis Set
description: With the lunch dishes cleared, your picnic table becomes the scene of amazing spins and unexpected rallies. The retractable net fits most standard tables.  Serve!Includes 2 full size paddles, 3 balls, adjustable net and a mesh carry bag.Fits tables up to 4.4cm thick, 183cm wide.Packaged dimensions:  26 x 16 x 10cm.
